headline: Will New Defense Wins and Record Backlog Change Northrop Grumman's (NOC) B‑21-Centered Narrative?
summary: In recent weeks, Northrop Grumman has secured several major U.S. defense contracts, including a US$233 million Navy torpedo deal, a US$94.3 million rocket-motor award, and selection for the Marine Corps’ MUX TACAIR Collaborative Combat Aircraft program, while also raising its 2026 sales forecast on the back of a record US$91.50 billion backlog. These wins underscore the company’s deepening role in next-generation defense programs, from the B-21 Raider to advanced unmanned systems and missile...

headline: The New World Order Isn't A Theory - It's How I'm Investing
summary: Navigate the shift from globalization to resilience with investment themes in defense, resources & infrastructure. Read more details here.
